Minors.name: You must be 18 years old to join the server. Anyone found to be under 18 will be banned.
Minors.warn: You must be 18 or older to join the server

Minors.name: Anybody found harboring a minor or providing advice on how to remain on the server as a minor will be banned.
Minors.warn: You cannot help minors stay on the server

Minors.name: You must verify your age to join the server.

Safety.name: Do not save other people's pictures or videos without their permission.
Do not share anything that compromises your privacy.
Be careful when sharing your personal information.

General Rules.name: English only.
General Rules.warn: Please speak English in the server

General Rules.name: Post in the correct channels.
General Rules.warn: Please post in the correct channels

General Rules.name: Creepy or disruptive behavior results in instant ban without warnings.
General Rules.warn: Please do not be creepy or disruptive

General Rules.name: No porn or links to porn

Content Guidelines.name: Breast and butt nudity is allowed throughout the server if labeled as NSFW.
Content Guidelines.warn: Please label images of breasts/butt nudity as NSFW

Content Guidelines.name: Bruising, blood, hard kinks, and nudity must be spoiled.
Content Guidelines.warn: Please mark images of bruising, blood, hard kinks, and nudity with a spoiler

Content Guidelines.name: Genital nudity is only allowed in <#${channels.sfw-kinky}>.
Content Guidelines.warn: Please only post images of genital nudity in <#${channels.sfw-kinky}>

Content Guidelines.name: Genitals cannot be the focus of the content even if fully clothed.
Content Guidelines.warn: Please do not post images of genitals even if fully clothed

Content Guidelines.name: No explicit sexual acts.
Content Guidelines.warn: Please do not post images of explicit sexual acts
